# autoGAM

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of autoGAM is to automate the evaluation process of different forms of predictors and create the best Generalized Additive Model.

## Installation

You can install the released version of autoGAM (Version: 0.1.0) from [github] with:

``` r
install.packages('devtools') #If you haven't installed it yet!

devtools::install_github('Shahin-Roshani/autoGAM')
```
